QuestData.Title: Operation Fishgut
QuestData.Description: The Bilgewater Battalion are now accepting recruits for OPERATION FISHGUT.$B$BWages will consist of 1 gold piece at the time of operation completion for all active soldiers in good standing. All wages will be forfeited in the event of death. A fee of 20 silver will be charged for any resurrections performed in the line of duty.$B$BAll recruits are to report for duty directly to Commander Molotov under the main cannon.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report for active duty to Commander Molotov under the main cannon in Bilgewater Harbor.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome back to duty soldier. Good to have you back.
